protocol.text: The raw data was analyzed using the MAS5 and ANOVA method. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =
After 7 days of germination, the roots were collected and snap frozen in liquid nitrogen.

Seeds were sterilized for 10 minutes in 10% bleach containing 0.1% Tween 20. After washing with water for 3 times, the seeds were sown on a nylon mesh placed on agar MS medium in a 100 mm x 100 mm square plate, and the seeds were allowed to germinate vertically in a Percival growth chamber with 16 hrs light, 8 hrs dark, at 22C.
0.1 g root tissue were grounded in liquid nitrogen and total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen Plant RNeasy Kit.

Total RNA was converted into cDNA using the Invitrogen Transcriptase III Kit; Biotin-labelled cRNA was then prepared from the cDNA templates and fragmentted using the Affymetrix cRNA amplification system.
Hybridization was performed by the Expression Analysis company, following the standard protocols recommended by they vendor.
Scanning was done by the Expression Analysis company.
